name: TrID Definitions Package
summary: Learn about .TRD files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: The main definitions package is named "TrIDDefs.TRD" and is loaded when the application is opened. Files selected by the user are checked against the definitions in the TrIDDefs.TRD file to determine the file type.
TrID is a free program developed by Marco Pontello. The program and file definition updates can be downloaded from the TrID home page.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
